content.rendered:
Private Retreat of 4 beautifully designed 4-bedroom homes

CURRENTLY AVAILABLE

$1,995,000+vat

register interest

Property Information

An amazing opportunity to acquire this very unique property comprising of four beautifully designed 4-bedroom holiday villas, each with its very own private swimming pool. This superb self-catering accommodation complex caters exceptionally well to the high demand of holidaymakers travelling together in groups and families to Rarotonga.

Recently built in 2014 and perfectly positioned on a generous 2,530 sqm section in Titikaveka at the idyllic south-end of Rarotonga, with a commercial lease running until 2074.

Nestled in a quiet family lane off the back road, this location offers guests seclusion & tranquility amidst lush tropical surroundings. Just a short stroll of less than 1km from the white sand beaches Titikaveka has to offer.

Spacious interior design with high rafted ceilings, polished parquet/hardwood floors, mahogany & cedar wood surface finishes, and large windows and glass doors providing beautiful natural light.

Each home boasting 4 spacious double bedrooms, 2 shared ensuite bathrooms, and a spacious open-plan living area compassing the kitchen, dining, and lounge room. Two bedrooms have large glass sliding doors creating seamless flow onto outdoor space. Extensive timber decks wrap around 3 sides of the lounge room, and create the perfect retreat for relaxing and entertaining.

In addition, an undercover outdoor barbeque patio opens onto the private swimming pool area with sunbathing decks.

All louvered windows are screened for insects, and bedrooms are equipped with ceiling fans, built-in wardrobes with safe, mini-bar, and king size bed which can be split into two single beds.

A fantastic home & income opportunity or complete turn-key tourist accommodation investment in a very picturesque secluded setting!

Plenty of room to grow the business and excellent potential to build an additional dwelling on the available land space.

For a video overview, see link at https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vuhohPb9L7g 

Your chance to acquire your own piece of paradise with these well-appointed Paradise Holiday Homes!

  • Commercial leasehold ownership until 2074
  • Generous section of 2,530sqm with lush tropical surroundings and mountain backdrop
  • Desirable quiet location off the back road in Titikaveka, in tranquil surroundings
  • 4x fully self-contained villas, each with its own private swimming pool, undercover patio, and poolside deck areas
  • Each villa features 4x double bedrooms, 2x shared ensuite bathrooms, open-plan kitchen/dining/living area, and hallway with laundry closet
  • Spacious interior design complete with high rafted ceilings, polished parquet/hardwood floors, mahogany and cedar wood surface finishes, insect screens on all louvered windows, ceiling fans in bedrooms
  • Reputation for excellent service with 'superb' 9/10 rating on Booking.com
  • Plenty of room to grow business and potential to build an additional dwelling on available land space
  • Sold with quality furniture & furnishings as a full turn-key tourism accommodation investment
Register interest

Showcasing a private retreat of 4 beautifully designed 4-bedroom homes

Register your interest

Get in touch at Jeff Tikitau Real Estate for further details!

  • enquire@jefftikitaurealestate.com
  • +682 53659
  • Main Road, Avarua Rarotonga, Cook Islands
